thread.title: Gail Flint
thread.title_full: Smart Start, Inc. reviewed by Gail Flint

author: Gail Flint
title: Gail Flint
text:
Chelsea has an excellent customer service presence. Very helpful and knowledgeable. She made me feel comfortable. I have her her number and extension to call back on Monday for her to assist me. I could not start my car today....who knows why...so I was not able to access my vehicle after about twenty attempts. At this point a friend came and gave me a ride , so my car was not accessible to meOtherwise she offered to have me go to my car and troubleshoot. I thank her and hope you value her as an employee.
The people at the Charleston, WV location are not only uncaring. They are rude and abrupt. NO help at all.
Gail Flint
07/17/1960
